DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate topical application Cocaine HCl 4 % 10 % safety efficacy local ( topical ) anesthesia diagnostic procedure surgery accessible mucous membrane nasal cavity .
DOC.brief_title: Topical Application Cocaine HCl 4 % 10 % Safety Efficacy Local ( Topical ) Anesthesia
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized , prospective , multisite , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group study Placebo Topical Solution versus Cocaine HCl 4 % 10 % Topical Solution anesthetic prior diagnostic procedure surgery . In Safety Efficacy first phase , subject randomize 1:1:1 fashion one three treatment group ( placebo , Cocaine HCl 4 % 10 % topical solution ) pre-procedure give one application 4 mL one bottle assigned test product . After pre-procedure Von Frey filament testing , blind broken , relative placebo versus cocaine , relative strength cocaine . The placebo subject exit participation efficacy portion trial , follow safety 7 day . Treatment group subject feel pain Von Frey test receive surgery diagnostic procedure also follow safety 7 day . In Safety second phase , subject randomize 1:1 fashion one two treatment group ( Cocaine HCl 4 % 10 % topical solution ) pre-procedure give one application one 4 mL assign test product . After pre-procedure Von Frey filament testing reveals pain score 0 , subject receive surgery diagnostic procedure , subject follow safety 7 day .
DOC.criteria: Provide write informed consent HIPAA authorization . Residents California must also review sign California Subject Bill Rights . Male female â‰¥18 year age . Predetermined need physician diagnostic procedure surgery nasal mucous membrane either one two nostril . Ability feel pain sensation normally nasal mucous membrane , verify via Von Frey 5.18 monofilament test . Ability clearly communicate pain sensation nasal mucous membrane . Has know allergy ester base anesthetic include cocaine HCl , procaine , tetracaine , chloroprocaine , dibucaine , benzocaine , and/or compound drug and/or device part protocol . ( Amide base anesthetic allergy NOT exclusionary . Amide base anesthetic : Lidocaine , Mepivicaine , Bupivicaine , Levobupivicaine , Ropivicaine , Etidocaine , Prilocaine , Articaine ) . Has history abuse control substance , nasal otherwise , damage nasal space opinion investigator might interfere ability subject investigator judge anesthesia trial drug . Has use investigational drug ( ) within 30 day precede randomization . Is pregnant nurse mother Women childbearing potential ( WOCBP ) men must use acceptable method contraception avoid pregnancy throughout study , woman 30 day men 90 day last dose investigational product manner risk pregnancy risk pregnancy minimize . Is < 18 year age Suffers condition , need diagnostic procedure surgery nasal mucous membrane , opinion Investigator , would compromise safety subject and/or quality data , normal wound heal process . Use analgesic 2 day prior screen need use drug screen period . This include NSAID ibuprofen , diclofenac , indomethacin , sulindac , tolmetin , ketoprofen , flurbiprofen , naproxen , opioids codeine , hydrocodone , hydromorphone , morphine , oxycodone , aspirin , acetaminophen . Subjects experienced seizure take isoniazid ( INH ) , phenothiazine , chlorpromazine , thioridazine , theophylline , tricyclic antidepressant amitriptyline . Has previously receive study drug study . Subjects fail screening may rescreen eligibility requirement meet . Has history myocardial infarction , coronary artery disease , congestive heart failure , irregular heart rhythm ( fully define section 9.4 , 9.5 , 9.6 protocol ) , uncontrolled hypertension taking ( recently take ) monoamine oxidase inhibitor . Uncontrolled hypertension define systolic blood pressure great equal 140 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure great equal 90 mm Hg Has know personal family history hereditary pseudocholinesterase deficiency . Study participant screen ask personal family history anesthetic reaction , anesthetic death , previous diagnosis pseudocholinesterase deficiency relative personally . Subjects identify pseudocholinesterase deficiency risk delay recovery certain anesthetic ( e.g . succinylcholine esterbased anesthetic ) . Has know personal family history pheochromocytoma . Study participant specifically ask treated pheochromocytoma previously family member diagnose pheochromocytoma ( since 10 % familial ) . Has know personal family history adrenal tumor . Use amphetamines 2 day prior screen need use drug course study . All stimulant prescription , nonprescription product catecholamine ( norepinephrine epinephrine ) , ephedrine , pseudoephedrine amphetamine 48 hour prior screen need use drug course study . All herbal product also prohibit within 48 hour prior screen subject need use drug course study . Has screen 12lead ECG finding abnormality list section 7.9.4 , 7.9.5 , 7.9.6 protocol . Generally , current prior myocardial ischemia infarction , dysrhythmia , risk serious dysrhythmia ( prolonged QT interval ) An exception would 7.9.5.11 sinus bradycardia sinus tachycardia present , Investigator must determine whether find clinically relevant exclusionary .
